channel.title: Ns on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Ns on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.description:
Canonical sources

  • AM: Turtle
  • Asset: XML
  • Automation: XML
  • LDBP: XML
  • CM: Turtle
  • Config: Turtle
  • Core: Turtle
  • EMS: XML
  • Perfmon: XML
  • QM: Turtle
  • RM: Turtle
  • TRS: Turtle

Converting RDF files

  1. Make sure Jena is installed and its bin dir is on your PATH.
  • You will need Java11 (SDKMan)
  • get Apache jena command line utilities
  • Download from Apache Jena Releases to say ~/lib/
  • export JENA_HOME=~/lib/jena-4.6.1/apache-jena
  • export PATH=$PATH:$JENA_HOME/bin
  • Make sure JAVA_HOME is set properly
  • Or use brew install jena
  1. Go into a folder in the NS.
  2. Run ../../../bin/conneg.sh <file>. where <file> is the name of a vocab or shape ttl file wihout the .ttl extension
  3. Make sure exit code is 0 and the files are intact.

Checking all files

find . -type f -regextype posix-extended -regex ‘.*.(nt|jsonld|xml|rdf|ttl)’ -print0 | xargs -0 -I{} riot –check –strict –sink {}
